A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Unlike other \"fans\" I realize the new trilogy of the Star Wars movies are not for the old generation\, but the new generation and I'm able to watch these with an open mind. I greatly enjoyed watching the new heroes find their place in the new rebellion. It was bitter sweet seeing Princess Leia. I don't want to ruin this movie for anyone. It's got the feels of Empire Strikes back with a twist. I completely recommend watching.
